::Zardus/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer/The Oblitercons::

Zardus nods, returning Phobia's tranmission. "The Maximals are no longer a 
threat in the area," he says, "But there are still a few. We'll take care of 
them."

He switches his comm to an Alliance frequency. "Alliance bots, surround the 
Maximal with the hostage. I'll do the talking. If he doesn't cooperate, kill 
them both."

He frowns as he sees Gotron, Treadshot, and Catgut running into Phobia's 
ship. "Gotron, Treadshot, Catgut," he says to them over the comm-link, "Where 
are you going? The ship isn't our buisness, we're just here to get rid of the 
Maximals."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica nods at Zardus' orders, flying to hover in front of Deemos, his 
missile launcher ready. Bloodystrike flies in, stopping on the other side of 
the Maximal, his missile launcher also ready.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dark One transforms into robot mode, flying down to hover behind Deemos, Pyro 
in tank mode and Scavanger in HUMVEE mode driving in to stop on either side 
of him, blocking the Maximal's escape back.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Breakdown and Hiss transform back into robot modes, walking up on either side 
of Deemos, their weapons ready.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus flies in, looking at Deemos, his weapons ready as well. "You have no 
where to go, Maximal," he says loudly enough for Deemos to hear him, "One 
move and you, and the Predacon hostage, die. Drop the Pred and you might yet 
live..."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing Atma heading for Deemos, DevilDuer runs up to the bot. "Whooa," he 
says, "I don't think you should interfere there, it could get ugly."
